metadata.title: CVE-2014-6633 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The safe_eval function in trytond in Tryton before 2.4.15, 2.6.x before2.6.14, 2.8.x before 2.8.11, 3.0.x before 3.0.7, and 3.2.x before 3.2.3allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via shellmetacharacters in (1) the collection.domain in the webdav module or (2) theformula field in the price_list module.

criterions.comment: tryton-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
